PSUOAuth2Security.description: OAuth flow, it is required when the PSU needs to perform SCA with the ASPSP when a TPP wants to access an ASPSP resource owned by the PSU

TPPOAuth2Security.description: TPP client credential authorisation flow with the ASPSP

parameters.name: xFapiAuthDate
parameters.description:
The time when the PSU last logged in with the TPP. 
All dates in the HTTP headers are represented as RFC 7231 Full Dates. An example is below: 
Sun, 10 Sep 2017 19:43:31 UTC

parameters.name: xFapiCustomerIpAddress
parameters.description: The PSU's IP address if the PSU is currently logged in with the TPP.

parameters.name: xFapiInteractionId
parameters.description: An RFC4122 UID used as a correlation id.

parameters.name: authorization
parameters.description: An Authorisation Token as per https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc6750

parameters.name: xCustomerUserAgent
parameters.description: Indicates the user-agent that the PSU is using.

responses.description: An array of detail error codes, and messages, and URLs to documentation to help remediation.
An array of detail error codes, and messages, and URLs to documentation to help remediation.
An array of detail error codes, and messages, and URLs to documentation to help remediation.
